Class Player_L0

java.lang.Object
GameUnit
Player_L0
Direct Known Subclasses:
Player_L1
public class Player_L0 extends GameUnit
Characterize the general player, record the score, life value, angle, collision box, be able to blink independently (open and close the mouth), self-responsibly detect collisions with different objects and perform different actions including pre-judgment of collision with the wall, and Judgment of completed collision with ghosts and dots, records the origin and can return to the origin.

      public void checkAround()

    • checkCollideWithGhost

      protected boolean checkCollideWithGhost(Ghost gst)
      Checks whether the player has collided with a ghost.
      Parameters:
      gst - the ghost being checked for collision
      Returns:
      true if the player has collided with the ghost, and call dieAndReset

    • EatDot

      protected void EatDot(Dot dt)
      Eats a dot if the player has collided with it. after eating turn the Dot existence to false
      Parameters:
      dt - the dot being checked for collision

    • isToCollideWithWall

      public boolean isToCollideWithWall(double x, double y, Object logic)
      check whether the attempt step is valid move for limiting the actual move of both Player_L0 and Player_L1. Third parameter roughly defined as Object to react accordingly on game logic type. If none of ShadowPacLogic_L0 and ShadowPacLogic_L1 matches the given logic, do nothing with a false return.
      Parameters:
      x - attemptX
      y - attemptY
      logic - the ShadowPacLogic instance used for delegation.
      Returns:
      true for invalid due to Wall
